games.title: Cage's Declaration Run
games.author: favstats
games.theme: Nic Cage must steal the Declaration of Independence again, but this time it's harder
games.description: Dodge security lasers as Nic Cage to steal the Declaration of Independence. Bullet hell gameplay with Comic Sans MS font.

games.title: LaughTrack.exe
games.author: favstats
games.theme: You're a robot learning to be human by watching sitcoms
games.description: A retro CRT pong-duel where you're a robot trying to "learn humor" by blasting the ball past the TV Network. Build HUMANITY to 100% to win, but every mistake drains BATTERY—which also funds desperate upgrades (big paddle, slow time, multiball). Fast, noisy, and beatable in 2–5 minutes.

games.title: The Polite Poltergeist
games.author: favstats
games.theme: You're a poltergeist who's too polite to haunt
games.description: You are a polite ghost, haunting by building up your courage.aYou're Percy, a poltergeist taking your final haunting exam—but you're too polite! Your scares keep turning into nice gestures like serving tea and complimenting décor. Frantically mash SPACEBAR to overcome your politeness and keep your Scare Meter high, then click on wandering humans to haunt them. If your meter is too low, you'll make them cozy instead of scared! Successfully scare 10 humans in 90 seconds to earn your Haunting License.

games.title: OHIO SIGMA GRINDSET
games.author: favstats
games.theme: All memes combine: Skibidi rizz gyatt Ohio and you must navigate the chaos
games.description: You're trapped in Ohio (the meme version) and must escape by navigating through NPCs using your sigma grindset techniques. Each NPC type requires a specific counter-move.

games.title: FURRY CON CRISIS MANAGER
games.author: favstats
games.theme: You're a furry managing a furry con with lots of other furries (different animals)
games.twist: You are not actually a furry
games.description: You're Dave — a totally normal human hired to manage FurryCon 2024. Problem: the attendees are getting dangerously hyped and chaos is rising! Armed with your trusty Hydration Cannon, blast water bottles at overheated furries (wolves, foxes, dragons, rabbits, and more) to cool them down before the convention descends into total mayhem.

games.title: The Lost Lamp
games.author: favstats
games.theme: You're a genie whose lamp gets lost and you must find it
games.description: The Lost Lamp is a musical hangman game where you play as a genie whose magical lamp has been scattered across mystical realms. Solve five enchanted words to complete the "Song of Summoning" and call your lamp home. The twist? Music narrates your journey—correct guesses build a harmonious melody while mistakes create dissonance. Watch your genie fade as essence drains, listen for the music's guidance, and restore the magic before it's too late.
